nodes.text: Solo: A Star Wars Story: Meet the Crew

Solo: A Star Wars Story: Meet the Crew is a young-readers book in the World of Reading series from Disney–Lucasfilm Press. It was written by Ella Patrick and was published on May 25, 2018 in concert with the film Solo: A Star Wars Story.
Meet Han, Chewie, Lando, Qi'ra and the rest of the crew from Solo: A Star Wars Story.
